comment: Caramel sweetness, dried cherimoya and mango, beer, and slightly spicy.

Master Distiller – Barry Crockett. Serial number 16159.

This is the 1998 release of Midleton's excellent limited production Very Rare series - started in 1984. Matured in American oak barrels. Master blender - Barry Crockett. 

(credit to published reviews - on which I built mine)
